title: What are your opinions?
selftext:
I believe such missions need to be in the mainstream then only people will have more knowledge about them ( inspire students to pursue careers in these fields).  It offers transparency in mission progress and outcomes. It allows the public to witness both successes and challenges, which can build trust in space agencies and their work.
